title: Help - Recently released font for dyslexics
content:
Hello everyone,

Due to Typophile's long-broken and useless search feature, I wasn't able to find an answer to this.

In the past month, a font was released for dyslexics.

It is NOT OpenDyslexic. But that is the only thing I can find through Google.

Does anyone know what font this is?

Thanks.
author: cdavidson

comments.content:
Actually lately we've been able to search Typophile with Google just fine. Although that's why the spam hordes are back upon us again... :-/

Like I put "typophile dyslexia" and the thread above was Google's first result!

hhp
